alpfore.evaluators.dna_hybridization module¶

class alpfore.evaluators.dna_hybridization.CGDNAHybridizationEvaluator(gd_long: int, gd_short: int, short_length: int, long_length: int, sticky_length: int, walker: int = 1)¶

Bases: alpfore.core.evaluator.BaseEvaluator

Counts anti-parallel (“legal”) and parallel (“illegal”) sticky-strand hybridisations for each frame of a trajectory.

output_dim = 2¶
alpfore.evaluators.dna_hybridization.compute_cv_cutoff(traj: Union[str, pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, List[Tuple[str, int, int, int]]], system_features: Optional[Tuple[str, int, int, int]] = None, legal_thresh: float = 0.8, write_path: Union[str, pathlib.Path, None] = None, base_dir: Union[str, pathlib.Path] = '../DFP_ActiveLearning/2.Calc_ddG') → Union[int, pandas.core.frame.DataFrame]¶

If traj is a string or DataFrame, compute cutoff for a single system. If traj is a list of tuples (candidate list), compute cutoffs for each system. If write_path is given, write resulting table of CV cutoffs to disk.

alpfore.evaluators.dna_hybridization.evaluate(self, trj: mdtraj.core.trajectory.Trajectory) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶
